Introduction
This topic contains information on disability or death from use of tobacco products, including
prohibition against direct SC
disability secondary to a tobacco-related SC disability
example of a claim for a disability secondary to a tobacco-related SC disability
secondary SC for disability or death related to tobacco use after service
considering claims for secondary SC
, and
example of a claim for secondary SC for a disability related to tobacco use after service
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section D  - Disability  or Death from Use of Alcohol, Drugs, or Tobacco Products
citation: Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section D
